name: Ashish Ghosh
content: Ashish Ghosh's Home Page At present serving as the Director of IIIT Bhubaneswar Dr. Ashish Ghosh, Fellow: IAPR, NASI, AAIA, AIIA, WAST Professor (HAG), Indian Statistical Institute Former Project Director, IDEAS-Technology Innovation Hub Former Head, Machine Intelligence Unit Former In-Charge, Center for Soft Computing Research Address Machine Intelligence Unit Indian Statistical Institute 203 B. T. Road Kolkata 700108, INDIA E-mail :ash@isical.ac.in, director@iiit-bh.ac.in Phone : +91-67-4265-3300 Research Interest Data science, big data analysis, internet of things and data mining Deep learning and neural networks Machine learning and pattern recognition Cognitive computing Video, colour, medical and remotely sensed image analysis Natural computing/soft computing/computational intelligence Bioinformatics and computational biology h-index: 53  (Google Scholar) i10-index:                 136 (Google Scholar) Total Citations: 9165 (Google Scholar) This page is last modified on Tuesday, June 14, 2022 05:04 PM.
